title: Adam Schiff Gets Busted (Ep 1126)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning new low in the tactics used by sleazy Adam Schiff. We are in a dangerous place for the Republic. I also address the troubling ties between this key Mueller witness and the Obama administration. The witness has been indicted. News Picks:Adam Schiff has crossed a red-line with his latest corrupt tactic.

 

Adam Schiff hired this colleague of the fake whistleblower the day after the Trump/Ukraine call.

 

Devin Nunes sues CNN and calls them the “Mother of fake news.”

 

A convicted pedophile, used by Mueller as an informant, has been indicted for illegal campaign contributions.  

 

Nellie Ohr has already stated that one of her sources was Ukrainian. 

 

Virginia is moving forward on gun confiscation and people are revolting.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
